p: The first step of the study was to create a checklist of alien plant species found in the Middle Volga Region ( Senator and Vasjukov 2019). The conceptual basis of the study is the adoption of the idea of the invasive species as an alien plant naturalising into the natural and semi-natural plant communities ( Richardson et al. 2010a, Baranova et al. 2018). Hence, all other alien plant species are either recognised as potentially invasive (established and successfully propagating in places where they are introduced, but not spreading into natural and semi-natural plant communities) or non-naturalised.
